verbose_text: The NAD (P) H : quinone oxidoreductase 1 enzyme induced the reductive activation of the benzoquinone to form hydroquinone, which introduced a self-immolative bond to cleave the capping agent from the tether and release the encapsulated drug.
evidence: NAD(P)H:quinone oxidoreductase 1 enzyme induced the reductive activation of the benzoquinone
